article_title: Norman Regional looks at campus consolidation

article_metadata.author: Joy Hampton Senior Staff Writer

og.description: Ten years ago Norman Regional Hospital Authority trustees envisioned a second hospital. Five years later, in the fall of 2009, the HealthPlex opened on the west side of Interstate 35
